alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 1:02AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Chemung, Tioga, southern Tompkins and Bradford Counties through 200 AM EST... At 101 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danby to near Grover. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Barton, Sayre, Waverly, Owego, Athens, Danby, Towanda, Ridgebury and Canton. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 59 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
